description: The Metallurgy group at CanmetMINING (CMIN) has a requirement for a Solvent Extraction (SX) Pilot Plant, consisting of a laboratory scale series of mixer-settlers equipped with pH control on a selected number of the mixer-settlers. The SX Pilot Plant is required to extract various metals individually or in combination with other metals from leach liquors (metal rich aqueous solution). Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be on or before March 31, 2023. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.

### Request for Proposal Information
---------------------------

We are seeking a vendor to design and build a Solvent Extraction Pilot Plant for the Metallurgy group at CanmetMINING (CMIN). The plant will extract various metals individually or in combination from leach liquors.

### Delivery Information
----------------------

* Complete plant delivery must be made to Ottawa, ON by March 31, 2023.
* The pilot plant will be used for laboratory-scale testing of mixer-settlers equipped with pH control on a selected number of the mixer-settlers.

### Evaluation Criteria
------------------------

* The selection criteria for this bid are Lowest Price.
